00013 class NameTableMap : public lsf::basic::Error, public lsf::basic::Singleton<NameTableMap> {
00014 public:
00015     constexpr static char const* COMMENT   = "//";
00016     constexpr static char const* MESSSAGE  = "message";
00017     constexpr static char const* ENUM      = "enum";
00018     constexpr static char const* BLOCK_END = "}";
00019     constexpr static char const* PACKAGE   = "package";
00020     constexpr static char const* OPTION    = "option";
00021     constexpr static char const* OPTIONAL  = "optional";
00022     constexpr static char const* REQUIRED  = "required";
00023     constexpr static char const* REPEATED  = "repeated";
00024     using message_type     = std::map<std::string,std::string>;
00025     using enum_type        = std::map<std::string,std::string>;
00026     using message_map_type = std::map<std::string, message_type>;
00027     using enum_map_type    = std::map<std::string, enum_type>;
00028 
00029 public:
00030     bool Init(std::string const& file_name);
00031     void Clear();
00032     bool TranslateMessageName(google::protobuf::Descriptor const* pdesc, std::string& ch_name, std::string& en_name);
00033     bool TranslateEnumName(std::string const& enum_name, std::string& value_name);
00034 
00035 private:
00036     bool ProcessMessage();
00037     bool ProcessEnum();
00038     bool PreProcessLine();
00039     bool ProcessBlockName();
00040     void RemoveBlockName();
00041     std::string GetTailComment();
00042     bool IsStartWith(char const* token);
00043 
00044 private:
00045     size_t _line_count;
00046     std::fstream _fs;
00047     std::string _fname;
00048     std::string _line;
00049     std::string _block_name;
00050     message_map_type _message_map;
00051     enum_map_type _enum_map;
00052 };
